item.name: 209 - Add Script - Branch Static Route SDWAN

response.name: 16 - Add Script - Fix VPN in Branches

item.name: 210 - Exec Script - Branch Static Route SDWAN

response.name: 18 - Exec Script - Fix VPN in Branches

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Branch1 static route",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# Branch1 static Route
config router static
  edit 3
    set dst 100.64.1.5 255.255.255.255
    set gateway 192.2.0.2
    set device port1
  next
  edit 4
    set dst 128.66.0.0 255.255.255.0
    set gateway 192.2.0.2
    set device port1
end ",
                    "target": "device_database"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Branch2 static route",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# Branch2 Static Route
config router static
  edit 3
    set dst 100.64.1.5 255.255.255.255
      set gateway 203.0.113.1
      set device port1
    next
  edit 4
    set dst 128.66.0.0 255.255.255.0
    set gateway 203.0.113.1
    set device port1
end ",
                    "target": "device_database"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
